name: Tokyo NightZ
description:
Play as Z and jump around Tokyo at Night.

Watch out for Robocops and Spikes as they can be dangerous.

Follow and collet all the coins to get the highest score!

 

Thanks for playing!

Install instructions (only Windows) :

  1. Download .zip
  2. Unpack .zip
  3. Play the game!

Made with Unity

Sounds from https://www.epidemicsound.com/ and https://www.weloveindies.com/!

This is my first game which was developed as part of  HTK Aacademy's game creation class.
